text: Thanks for the talk on speed optimization yesterday <@U38EZFVFE> I’m currently working on replacing my font awesome icons with svgs.  I’m storing all my commonly used ones in partials and including them where necessary to keep my code looking as clean as possible while still being able to use css to change the appearance of the icons.
YES! That is a great way to create your own icon framework
Katie couric's final advice at inbound *learn to code*
I’m working on it. Thanks, Katie.

Thank you for sharing this question. I’m really interested in learning more about the API to be able to do more without depending on / waiting for another team to do work I’d be happy to learn how to do myself. 

Is there any way to sign up to get notified of when <@U3PKJ8EQL>’s course is published?
